
got to repo--> settings--> actions--> runners--addd created VM as runner.

mkdir actions-runner && cd actions-runner
curl -o actions-runner-linux-x64-2.331.0.tar.gz -L https://github.com/actions/runner/releases/download/v2.331.0/actions-runner-linux-x64-2.331.0.tar.gz
echo "5fcc01bd546ba5c3f1291c2803658ebd3cedb3836489eda3be357d41bfcf28a7  actions-runner-linux-x64-2.331.0.tar.gz" | shasum -a 256 -c

tar xzf ./actions-runner-linux-x64-2.331.0.tar.gz




# Runner # Create the runner and start the configuration experience

./config.sh --url https://github.com/rattisyam/Demo_GithubActions --token AGDDWTD7OTLWOTJRH5TEHI3JS65HW


Enter the name of the runner group to add this runner to: [press Enter for Default]

Enter the name of runner: [press Enter for GHAAGENT1]

This runner will have the following labels: 'self-hosted', 'Linux', 'X64'
Enter any additional labels (ex. label-1,label-2): [press Enter to skip] self-agent1

√ Runner successfully added

# Runner settings

Enter name of work folder: [press Enter for _work] /home/githuba/

√ Settings Saved.

run the runner:
./run.sh

githuba@GHAAGENT1:~/actions-runner$ ./run.sh

√ Connected to GitHub

Current runner version: '2.331.0'
2026-02-20 00:43:37Z: Listening for Jobs
